title: Ep137 Honeymoon Homicides
description: This week, the gals take a look at the less romantic side of post-nuptial vacations. Topics include capture as a means of marriage, a tragic South African murder with a questionable motive, and a pair of greedy lovers with a similar MO. Crack open a jammy bottle of Winc'sÂ Wonderful Wine Co. Red, plan a solomoon, and tune in for Honeymoon Homicides.
